lyrics:
47 contributorstranslationsالعربيةportuguêsme  the rhythm lyricsproduced by matt man  da robin

verse 1
ooh the rhythm takes you over
takes you to a different place
a different space
ooh the smoke is getting closer
i can feel our young blood race
through cityscapes

prechorus
and everybody wants to be touched
everybody wants to get some
but dont you play a song about love
when i move my body
i dont have to talk about none
let the chemicals do its stuff
til the energy is too much

is the rhythm
me and the rhythm
nothing between

and i know i know i know
i cant fight it
i wont i wont i wont
deny it
oh no oh no oh no
id be lying
if i said i didnt need
yeah the rhythm
me and the rhythm

no matter whats your history
be free with me oh
